title: Album Page, "Plan of Main Wall Inside, Chapel at Amboise, France", late 19th century
medium: Graphite on off-white wove paper with pre-printed blue ink ruled lines, mounted to thick, off-white laid paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto of ruled sheet, in graphite, upper right corner: 130; bottom right corner: chapel at Amboise / 123; bottom left edge: Plan of main wall inside.
dimensions:
Sheet: 21.5 x 17.2 cm (8 7/16 x 6 3/4 in.), irregular
Mount: 31.8 x 24.7 cm (12 1/2 x 9 3/4 in.), irregular
description: Vertical sheet illustrating a space with a cruciform plan.  Various supporting elements of the wall have been shaded, and dimensions of certain elements have been inscribed.

tombstone.epitaph: Album Page, "Plan of Main Wall Inside, Chapel at Amboise, France", late 19th century.Graphite on off-white wove paper with pre-printed blue ink ruled lines, mounted to thick, off-white laid paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-299.
